short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provices a context menu to extract the item-id from a url to the item details page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to copy the item-id of an item on ArcGIS Online to the clipboard. Right click on any link that matches opens the item details page, Operations Dashboard, Webmap Viewer, or Workforce in ArcGIS Online or Portal.
